title: "Widespread autonomous vehicle adoption still a decade away"
excerpt: "A world of self-driving vehicles and mobility-on-demand is likely to exist eventually, but for the next decade, widespread implementation of autonomous technology will not be realised, according to a new forecast from S&P Global Mobility."
